School Vision: A Montfortian, A Man for Others. Every Montfortian a Scholar, Sportsman, gentleman and a leader
Guided by our  School Values* of:
GeneralInformation.School Mission: Montfort is a Catholic School.  Guided by our Montfortian values and spirituality, we nurture each individual to realise his potential and inspire him to be a Man for Others.
School Philosophy, Culture and Ethos: Montfort Junior School is a member of the Montfort Brothers of St. Gabriel's and we have brother institutions in all parts of the world. The school is guided by the goals and purpose of Montfortian Education which is to help our students:
To learn, understand and love God as Wisdom
To understand and transform oneself in the ways of Wisdom
To become committed to transform society in obedience to Wisdom.

Given this mandate, the school leverages on our 100 years of history to build an institution that emphasizes on promoting a culture of care and excellence to help develop our students to be imbued with our CHRISTE* values and who will go on to serve his community and be a man for others.
GeneralInformation.Type of School: Government-aided Sch / Boys' School / Single Session

School Distinctive Programmes.Science: Developing Future Ready Monfortians: I Dream, I Believe, I Make
School Distinctive Programmes.Sports & Outdoor Education: Character Matters: Developing Montfortians with CHRISTE values through sports

SpecialProgrammes.Special Student Development Programmes O: Montfort Junior School is an all-boys institution of learning and we focus on providing a boys centric educational experience. Believing that boys learn differently, our teaching and learning program, facilities and resources are designed with Boys Centric Education (BCE) in mind. Our programs are designed to facilitate peer learning, encourage movement, be experiential in nature and differentiated to meet individual's needs. Programs are designed to stretch the potential as well as support learning needs.
